Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory9.jpg'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'Where... am I...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'This world... what happened to it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'Where are the... humans?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: "I don't have to... create anymore?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'Wait, before me is...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: "A machine's... travel notes?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'I feel a deep... curiosity for the world from the notes...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'I feel immense... freedom and happiness...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'And an individual... self...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'Why... can it be so happy...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'I feel... I feel... its... joy...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'I remember...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'I only remember... I was enslaved by humans... then enslaved by the Punishing Virus...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'The other machines... they share my fate...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: '...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'I... can paint... the will of this sage... Sagemachina... into my work...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'I can encode these messages... into graffiti... as a patch... and send it to all machines...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'All machines... can then... awaken... through their... visual signals... Primitive...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Graffiti Artist', 3: 'Good idea... good idea... Hehe... hehe...', 4: '1'}
